title_en: UK Did Not Participate in Strikes on Iran
summary_en: The UK has confirmed it did not participate in recent strikes on Iran, despite ongoing regional tensions. British Prime Minister Keir Starmer will convene an emergency Cobra meeting on February 28 to discuss the Middle East situation. This suggests the UK is monitoring the conflict closely but avoiding direct military involvement for now.
